RegistrationInfo.Author: ROEHL.COM\PETM
RegistrationInfo.Description: Downloads the ACH file from the federal reserve. This is used to validate the routing numbers in the Employee Web.

RegistrationInfo.Author: ROEHL.COM\dicwi
RegistrationInfo.Description: Looks for exceptions in fuel levels calculated at fuel events, saves them, and sends an exception notification e-mail for the first exception detected per unit.

RegistrationInfo.Author: ROEHL.COM\dicwi
RegistrationInfo.Description: Scheduled once a day, this process generates an e-mail notification listing all unit fuel metrics exceptions detected during the day.

RegistrationInfo.Author: ROEHL.COM\JENER
RegistrationInfo.URI: \RTI MyRoehl Console App - Delete Streaming Server Files

RegistrationInfo.URI: \RTI MyRoehl Console App - Your Choice Email

RegistrationInfo.Author: ROEHL.COM\ottri
RegistrationInfo.Description: Calculate trip detail miles without viapoints.
RegistrationInfo.URI: \RTI Trips Console App - Daily Trip Detail Miles Process

RegistrationInfo.Author: ROEHL.COM\OTTRI
RegistrationInfo.Description: Calculate trip detail miles for current, unpaid completed trips.

RegistrationInfo.Author: ROEHL.COM\PETM
ROEHL.COM\NIEDO
RegistrationInfo.Description: Retrieve the forms from DriverTech and store them in the database

RegistrationInfo.Author: ROEHL.COM\niedo
RegistrationInfo.Description: Polls unit devices for events, seeking out HardBrakingAlerts, and sends emails for each event. Alert is marked as processed.

RegistrationInfo.Author: ROEHL.COM\niedo
RegistrationInfo.Description: Verifies ViaPoint lat/long values against tbCompanyCityMaster lat/long values

RegistrationInfo.Author: ROEHL.COM\PETM
RegistrationInfo.Description: Sync program for updating the LastReportedCityState in IRIS over to the AS400. Also updates info like trailer and load status, current unit, current order, etc.

Path="Application"
>

RegistrationInfo.Author: Microsoft Corporation.
RegistrationInfo.Description: This task is used to start the Windows Update service when needed to perform scheduled operations such as scans.
